Strings.Text: {scroll 2}\nAn emergency power supply.{clear 0}{scroll 2}Will you turn it on?\n{branch 0}
{scroll 2}An emergency power \ngenerator.{clear 0}{scroll 2}Will you push the switch?{branch 0}

{scroll 2}It's a switch for the
elevator of the ladder.{clear 0}{scroll 2}It seems that it's not
functioning due to{clear 0}{scroll 2}
lack of power.
{scroll 2}It's a switch for the\nelevator of the ladder.{clear 0}{scroll 2}Will you lower the ladder?\n{branch 0}
